data.anv: वीर्यवान् valiant, सःसौमित्रिः Saumithri, रामस्य Rama's, आकारसूचितम् indication from his looks, ततश्छन्दम् accordingly, विज्ञाय understanding, रामस्य Rama's, मते earth, चिताम् pyre, चकार started
data.md: And understanding Rāmas intention by gestures and at his command the powerful Saumitri prepared a funeral pyre.

data.v: अधोमुखं ततो रामं शनैः कृत्वा प्रदक्षिणम् । उपासर्पत वैदेही दीप्यमानं हुताशनम् ।।
data.es: Thereafter, Vaidehi, walking clockwise near Rama went round him in accordance with tradition and approached the pyre.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, वैदेही Vaidehi, अधोमुखम् walking clockwise, स्थितम् stood, रामम् at Rama, प्रदक्षिणंकृत्वा went round in accordance with tradition, दीप्यमानम् glowing, हुताशनम् pyre, उपावर्तत approached
data.md: Thereupon circumambulating Rāma, standing with his head down, Vaidehi approached the burning fire.

data.v: प्रणम्य देवताभ्यश्च ब्राह्मणेभ्यश्च मैथिली । बद्धाञ्जलिपुटा चेदमुवाचाग्निसमीपतः ।।
data.es: Mythili greeted the gods and brahmanas with joined palms and went near fire and again joined her palms in greeting and spoke as follows.
data.anv: मैथिली Mythili, दैवतेभ्यश्च even to gods, ब्राह्मणेभ्यश्च brahmanas, प्रणम्य greeting with joined palms, अनगिसमीपतः near fire, बद्धाञ्जलिपुटा again joining her palms, इदम् this, उवाच च spoke
data.md: Bowing to the celestials and Brāhmaṇas, Maithilī, with folded hands, spoke before the fire.

data.v: यथा मे हृदयं नित्यं नापसर्पति राघवात् । तथा लोकस्य साक्षी मां सर्वतः पातु पावकः ।।
data.es: "If it is true that my heart has never slid from Raghava at all, may the fire god protect me always and so also the world witness."
data.anv: मे my, हृदयम् mind, राघवात् at Raghava, नापसर्पतियथा never slid at all, तथा so also, लोकस्य world's, साक्षी witness, पावकः fire god, माम् me, सर्वतःalways, पातु protect me
data.md: As my heart has never gone away from Rāghava, may you protect me, O fire, the witness of the people.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु वैदेही परिक्रम्य हुताशनम् । विवेश ज्वलनं दीप्तं निःसङ्गेनान्तरात्मना ।।
data.es: Having spoken in that way, Vaidehi went round fire fearlessly, absorbed with in herself and entered the flaming and burning fire.
data.anv: वैदेही Vaidehi, एवम् in that manner, उक्त्वा spoken, हुताशनम् pyre, परिक्रम्य went round, निःशङ्केन fearless, अन्तरात्मना absorbed in self, दीप्तम् flaming, ज्वलनम् burning, विवेशळ entered
data.md: Saying this and going round the fire, Vaidehi, with undaunted heart, entered the flaming fire.

data.v: जनः स सुमहांस्तत्र बालवृद्धसमाकुलः । ददर्श मैथिलीं तत्र प्रविशन्तीं हुताशनम् ।।
data.es: Young and old assembled there, and the gathering of people witnessed Mythili entering the flaming and burning fire.
data.anv: तत्र there, बालवृद्धसमाकुलः young and old assembled, सुमहान् gathering, जनश्च people, हुताशनम् fire, प्रविशन्तीम् entering, दीप्ताम् flaming, मैथिलीम् Mythili, ददर्श witnessed
data.md: The great assembly there, young and old, overwhelmed with grief, saw Maithili enter the flaming fire.

data.v: तस्यामग्निं विशन्त्यां तु हाहेति विपुलः स्वनः । रक्षसां वानराणां च संबभूवाद्भुतोपमः ।।
data.md: She having entered the fire, lamentations, unheard of before, rose from all sides from the Rākşasas and monkeys.

data.v: ततो वैश्रवणो राजा यमश्चामित्रकर्शनः । सहस्राक्षो महेन्द्रश्च वरुणश्च परंतपः ।।
षडर्धनयनः श्रीमान्महादेवो वृषध्वजः । कर्ता सर्वस्य लोकस्य ब्रह्मा ब्रह्मविदां वरः ।।
एते सर्वे समागम्य विमानैः सूर्यसंनिभैः । आगम्य नगरीं लङ्कामभिजग्मुश्च राघवम् ।।
ततः सहस्ताभरणान्प्रगृह्य विपुलान्भुजान् । अब्रुवंस्त्रिदशश्रेष्ठाः प्राञ्जलिं राघवं स्थितम् ।।
data.es: Then foremost of gods adorned with ornaments in hands lifted up their long shoulders and greeted Raghava with joined palms and spoke as follows.
data.anv: ततः then, त्रिदशश्रेष्ठाः foremost of gods, सहस्ताभरणान् adorned with ornaments in hands, विपुलान् long, भुजान् shoulders, प्रगृह्य taking up, प्राञ्जलिम् greeted with both palms, स्थितम् stood, राघवम् Raghava, अब्रुवन् spoke as follows
data.md: Thereupon raising up their huge hands, decked with various ornaments and folding them, those foremost of the celestials said to Raghava.

data.v: कर्ता सर्वस्य लोकस्य श्रेष्ठो ज्ञानवतां वरः । उपेक्षसे कथं सीतां पतन्तीं हव्यवाहने । कथं देवगणश्रेष्ठमात्मानं नावबुध्यसे ।।
data.es: "You are the creator of the entire world, knowledgeable and the foremost Lord of the host of gods. How did you keep watching Sita falling into fire'?
data.anv: सर्वस्य all sides, लोकस्य in the world, कर्ता creator, ज्ञानवताम् knowledgeable, श्रेष्ठः foremost, प्रभुः Lord, हव्यवाहने fire, पतन्तीम् falling, सीताम् Sita, कथम् how, उपेक्षसे looking, देवगणश्रेष्ठम् foremost of the hosts of Devas, आत्मानम् himself, कथम् how, नावबुद्ध्यसे not know?
data.md: O lord, you are the preserver of all the worlds and the foremost of the wise, why did you neglect Sītā entering into fire? Why did you not understand yourself the foremost of the celestials?

data.v: ऋतधामा वसुः पूर्वं वसूनां च प्रजापतिः । त्वं त्रयाणां हि लोकानामादिकर्ता स्वयंप्रभुः ।।
data.es: " Among the Vasus, you are the Rtadhama and the creator of the three worlds and the first creator and selfconstituted ruler."
data.anv: पूर्वम् in the past, वसूनाम् Vasus, ऋतधामा Rtadhama, वसुः Vasu, त्रयाणामपि creator of the three worlds, लोकानाम् in the world, आदिकर्ता first creator, स्वयंप्रभुः Lord himself, प्रजापतिः selfconstituted ruler
data.md: You were before the Patriarch of all Vasus, by the name of Rtadhāmā. And you are yourself, O lord, the creator of the three worlds. *A kind of demi-god of whom eight are enumerated.

data.v: रुद्राणामष्टमो रुद्रः साध्यानामपि पञ्चमः । अश्विनौ चापि ते कर्णौ चन्द्रसूर्यौ च चक्षुषी ।।
data.es: "You are the eighth among the Rudras, fifth among the Sadhyas, two Aswins are your ears, and the sun and moon are your eyes."
data.anv: रुद्राणाम् Rudra, अष्टम: eighth, रुद्रः Rudra, साध्यानाम् अपि among Sadhayas, पञ्चमः fifth, अश्विनौ twin Aswins, ते you, कर्णौ ears, सूर्याचन्द्रमसौ sun and moon are, दृशौ your eyes
data.md: You are the eighth of the Rudras and the fifth of the Sādhyas;-the Asvinis are your two ears and the sun and the moon are your eyes. 1. A demi-god-an inferior manifestation of Śiva: they are eleven in number. 2. An inferior deity or demi-god, one of a class of twelve.

data.v: अन्ते चादौ च लोकानां दृश्यसे त्वं परंतप । उपेक्षसे च वैदेहीं मानुषः प्राकृतो यथा ।।
data.es: "O Tormentor of enemies! You are at the beginning and at the end of the world. You are looking like a common man would look at Sita, when she was falling into pyre."
data.anv: परन्तप tormentor of enemies, लोकानाम् in the world, आदौ at the beginning, अन्ते च and at the end, दृश्यसे seen, प्राकृतः common, मानुषोयथा like the man, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, उपेक्षसे च looking as if you are ignorant
data.md: O slayer of enemies, you appear at the beginning and the end of the creation. Why did you neglect Vaidehī like an ordinary man?

data.v: इत्युक्तो लोकपालैस्तैः स्वामी लोकस्य राघवः । अब्रवीत्त्रिदशश्रेष्ठान्रामो धर्मभृतां वरः ।।
data.es: Rama the upholder of dharma and foremost and supreme god spoke after the ruler of the world had spoken to him.
data.anv: लोकपालैः ruler of the world, इति this, उक्तः having said, लोकस्य world, स्वामी Lord, राघवः Raghava, धर्मभृताम् upholder of Dharma, वरः foremost, रामः Rama, त्रिदशश्रेष्ठान् supreme god, अब्रवीत् spoke
data.md: Being thus addressed by the deities presiding over quarters, Rāghava, the lord of people and the foremost of the pious, spoke to those leading celestials, saying.

data.v: आत्मानं मानुषं मन्ये रामं दशरथात्मजम् । योऽहं यस्य यतश्चाहं भगवांस्तद्ब्रवीतु मे ।।
data.es: "I am Dasharatha's son, a human and thinking to be Rama. Tell me O divine creator, from where and whence I am here."
data.anv: आत्मानम् I am, दशरथात्मजम् Dasharatha's son, मानुषम् human, रामम् Rama, मन्ये thinking, सः he, अहम् I, यस्य from where, अहम् I, यश्च whence, तत् that, भगवान् divine, मे me, ब्रवीतु tell
data.md: I know myself to be man-Rama, the son of Dasaratha. Let the great Patriarch tell me, who I am and whence I have come.

data.v: इति ब्रुवाणं काकुत्स्थं ब्रह्मा ब्रह्मविदां वरः । अब्रवीच्छृणु मे राम सत्यं सत्यपराक्रम ।।
data.es: To Kakuthsa who spoke that way, creator Brahma replied, "O Lord of truthful prowess, listen to my true submission."
data.anv: इति thus, ब्रुवाणम् having said, काकुत्स्थम् Kakuthsa, ब्रह्मविदाम् creator, Brahma, वरः foremost, ब्रह्मा Brahma, अब्रवीत् said, सत्यपराक्रम truthful prowess, मे my, सत्यम् truth, वाक्यम् words, शृणु listen

data.v: भवान्नारायणो देवः श्रीमांश्चक्रायुधो विभुः । एकशृङ्गो वराहस्त्वं भूतभव्यसपत्नजित् ।।
data.es: "You are the divine self, glorious Narayana himself, wielder of discus. You are having a single tusk and a divine boar, knower of past and present."
data.anv: भवान् yourself, देवः divine, श्रीमान् glorious, चक्रायुधः wielder of discus, प्रभुः Lord, नाराणयः Narayana, त्वम् you, एकशृङ्गः single tusk, वराहः boar, भूतभव्यसपत्नजित् knower of past and future

data.v: अक्षरं ब्रह्मसत्यं च मध्ये चान्ते च राघव । लोकानां त्वं परो धर्मो विष्वक्सेनश्चतुर्भुजः ।।
data.es: "You are the imperishable Brahma in the midst or end, abiding in truth. You are dharma, all pervading four shouldered Vishnu in the world."
data.anv: अक्षरम् imperishable, मध्ये च in the midst, अन्ते च and end, सत्यं च truth, ब्रह्म Brahma, त्वम् you, लोकानाम् in the world, परः, धर्मः dharma, विष्वक्सेनः all pervading, चतुर्भुजः four shouldered

data.v: शार्ङ्गधन्वा हृषीकेशः पुरुषः पुरुषोत्तमः । अजितः खड्गधृग्विष्णुः कृष्णश्चैव बृहद्बलः ।।
data.es: "You are the wielder of Sarang bow, subduer of enemies, a supreme person, never faced defeat, wielder of sword, Vishnu, Krishna also and mighty."
data.anv: शार्ङ्गधन्वा wielder of Saranga bow, हृषीकेशः subduer of senses, पुरुषः man, पुरुषोत्तमः supreme person, अजितः never faced defeat, खङ्गभृत् wielder of sword, विष्णुः Vishnu, कृष्णश्चैव Krishna also, महाबलः mighty

data.v: सेनानीर्ग्रामणीश्च त्वं बुद्धिः सत्त्वं क्षमा दमः । प्रभवश्चाप्ययश्च त्वमुपेन्द्रो मधुसूदनः ।।
data.es: "You are the Karthikeya, the commander of army, village headman. You are the intellect, forbearance. You are the origin and end also. You are Vamana and destroyer of demon Madhu."
data.anv: त्वम् you, सेनानीः commander of the army of gods (Karthikeya), ग्रामणीश्च head of village, त्वम् you, बुद्धिः intellect, त्वम् you, क्षमा forbearance, दमः sense control, त्वम् you, प्रभवः origin, अप्ययश्च and end, उपेन्द्रःVamana, मधुसूदनः destroyer of demon Madhu

data.v: इन्द्रकर्मा महेन्द्रस्त्वं पद्मनाभो रणान्तकृत् । शरण्यं शरणं च त्वामाहुर्दिव्या महर्षयः ।।
data.es: "You are spoken of as the creator of Indra, Mahendra himself, Padmanabha, who puts an end to combat. You are a wonderful great sage and refuge of seekers."
data.anv: त्वम् you, इन्द्रकर्मा creator of Indra, महेन्द्रः Mahendra, पद्मनाभः Padmanabha, who has a lotus sprung from his navel, रणान्तकृत् who puts an end to combat, दिव्याः wonderful, महर्षयःgreat sage, त्वाम् you, शरण्यम् refuge, शरणम् of seekers, आहुः spoken of

data.v: सहस्रशृङ्गो वेदात्मा शतजिह्वो महर्षभः । त्वं यज्ञस्त्वं वषट्कारस्त्वमोंकारः परंतप ।।
data.md: You are the refuge of the Siddhas' and Sadhyas, you Purvaja, ja, the sacrifice, Vasatkara, Om and Paratpara.

data.v: प्रभवं निधनं वा ते न विदुः को भवानिति । दृश्यसे सर्वभूतेषु ब्राह्मणेषु च गोषु च ।।
दिक्षु सर्वासु गगने पर्वतेषु वनेषु च । सहस्रचरणः श्रीमाञ्शतशीर्षः सहस्रधृक् ।।
data.md: No one is conversant with your birth and destruction-you are manifest in all creaturescows and Brahmins-an all quarters, in the sky, in the mountain, and in the river. You are gifted with thousand legs, thousand heads and thousand eyes.

data.v: त्वं धारयसि भूतानि वसुधां च सपर्वताम् । अन्ते पृथिव्याः सलिले दृश्यसे त्वं महोरगः ।।
data.md: You did uphold all creatures, the earth and all the mountains. You appear like the great serpent in the water underneath the earth.

data.v: त्रीँल्लोकान्धारयन्राम देवगन्धर्वदानवान् । अहं ते हृदयं राम जिह्वा देवी सरस्वती ।।
data.md: O Rāma, you did uphold three creations-the celestials, the Gandharvas and the Dănvas. O Rāma I am your heart, the worshipful Sarasvati (Goddess of learning) is your tongue and all other celestials, O lord, created by Brahmă are your down. The closing of your eye is the night and the opening is the day.

data.v: देवा गात्रेषु लोमानि निर्मिता ब्रह्मणा प्रभो । निमेषस्तेऽभवद्रात्रिरुन्मेषस्तेऽभवद्दिवा ।।
संस्कारास्तेऽभवन्वेदा न तदस्ति त्वया विना । जगत्सर्वं शरीरं ते स्थैर्यं ते वसुधातलम् ।।
अग्निः कोपः प्रसादस्ते सोमः श्रीवत्सलक्षण । त्वया लोकास्त्रयः क्रान्ताः पुराणे विक्रमैस्त्रिभिः ।।
महेन्द्रश्च कृतो राजा बलिं बद्ध्वा महासुरम् । सीता लक्ष्मीर्भवान्विष्णुर्देवः कृष्णः प्रजापतिः ।।
वधार्थं रावणस्येह प्रविष्टो मानुषीं तनुम् । तदिदं नः कृतं कार्यं त्वया धर्मभृतां वर ।।
data.md: For Rāvana's destruction you have assumed the human shape. You have accomplished that work of ours, O you the foremost of the pious.

data.v: निहतो रावणो राम प्रहृष्टो दिवमाक्रम । अमोघं बलवीर्यं ते अमोघस्ते पराक्रमः ।।
data.md: O Rāma, Răvaşa has been slain. Do you go up to heaven delighted. Sure is your godly energy and never goes for nothing your prowess.

data.v: अमोघास्ते भविष्यन्ति भक्तिमन्तश्च ये नराः । ये त्वां देवं ध्रुवं भक्ताः पुराणं पुरुषोत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "Those mortals who are devoted to you, the supreme god, will be very successful. You are eternal, supreme being. Your devotees in this world and other world will always attain the desired results."
data.anv: भुवि in this world, तेभक्तिमन्तः whoever is devoted to you, नराः human, अमोघाः supreme, भविष्यन्ति will be very successful, ये they, देवम् god, ध्रुवम् firm, पुराणम् eternal, पुरुषोत्तमम् supreme human being, त्वाम् you, भक्ताः devotees, इहलोके in this world, परत्र च in other world, सदा always, कामाम् desired, प्राप्नुवन्ति will attain success.

data.v: ये नराः कीर्तयिष्यन्ति नास्ति तेषां पराभवः ।।
data.md: Those persons shall never be unsuccessful both in this world and the next who shall chant this theme-excellent, instinct with the knowledge of Brahmă and describing the old history.

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा शुभं वाक्यं पितामहसमीरितम् । अङ्केनादाय वैदेहीमुत्पपात विभावसुः ।।
data.es: On hearing creator Brahma's address to Rama, fire god emerged picking auspicious Vaidehi in his arms.
data.anv: विभावसुः fire god, पितामहसमीरितम् address of Brahma, शुभम् auspicious, एतत् these, वाक्यम् words, श्रुत्वा hearing, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अङ्केन under arms, आदाय picking, उत्पपात arose
data.md: Hearing those excellent words uttered by the great Patriarch rose up Vibhāvasu (The deity of Fire) with Vaidehi on his lap shaking the funeral pyre.

data.v: तरुणादित्यसंकाशां तप्तकाञ्चनभूषणाम् । रक्ताम्बरधरां बालां नीलकुञ्चितमूर्धजाम् ।।
data.es: Radiating like the rising sun, adorned with polished gold ornaments, wearing red coloured clothes, with beautiful black hair, wearing fresh flowers, being in the same young form as before, blameless Vaidehi was held in the arms of the fire god and presented to Rama.
data.anv: विभावसुः fire god, तरुणादित्यसङ्काशम् radiating brightly like rising sun, तप्तकाञ्चनभूषणाम् adorned with polished gold ornaments, रक्ताम्बरधराम् wearing red coloured robes, नीलकुञ्चितमूर्थजाम् with beautiful black hair, अक्लिष्टमाल्याभरणाम् with fresh looking flowers, तथारूपाम् in the same form as before, अनिन्दिताम् blameless, बालाम् young, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अङ्के arms, कृत्वा holding, रामाय to Rama, ददौ gave
data.md: And carrying on his lap Vaidehī, wearing a red cloth, resembling the newly risen sun, adorned with ornaments of burning gold-having black curling hairs and decked with fresh garments, Vibhāvasu gave her to Rāma.

data.v: अक्लिष्टमाल्याभरणां तथा रूपां मनस्विनीम् । ददौ रामाय वैदेहीमङ्के कृत्वा विभावसुः ।।
data.es: Radiating like the rising sun, adorned with polished gold ornaments, wearing red coloured clothes, with beautiful black hair, wearing fresh flowers, being in the same young form as before, blameless Vaidehi was held in the arms of the fire god and presented to Rama.
data.anv: विभावसुः fire god, तरुणादित्यसङ्काशम् radiating brightly like rising sun, तप्तकाञ्चनभूषणाम् adorned with polished gold ornaments, रक्ताम्बरधराम् wearing red coloured robes, नीलकुञ्चितमूर्थजाम् with beautiful black hair, अक्लिष्टमाल्याभरणाम् with fresh looking flowers, तथारूपाम् in the same form as before, अनिन्दिताम् blameless, बालाम् young, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अङ्के arms, कृत्वा holding, रामाय to Rama, ददौ gave
data.md: And carrying on his lap Vaidehī, wearing a red cloth, resembling the newly risen sun, adorned with ornaments of burning gold-having black curling hairs and decked with fresh garments, Vibhāvasu gave her to Rāma.

data.v: अब्रवीच्च तदा रामं साक्षी लोकस्य पावकः । एषा ते राम वैदेही पापमस्या न विद्यते ।।
data.es: Then the fire god who is a witness in the world, spoke to Rama," Here is your wife Vaidehi and she does not know any sin."
data.anv: तदा then, लोकस्य in the world, साक्षी witness, पावकः fire god, रामम् to Rama, अब्रवीत् spoke तु you, राम Rama, एषा this way, ते you, वैदेही Vaidehi, अस्याम् she, पापम् sin, न विद्यते not know
data.md: Thereupon the Deity of Fire, the witness of the people, spoke to Rāma, saying, O Rāma, here is your Vaidehi-no sin has visited her.

data.v: नैव वाचा न मनसा नानुध्यानान्न चक्षुषा । सुवृत्ता वृत्तशौण्डीरा न त्वामतिचचार ह ।।
data.es: "Sita is of good conduct and auspicious. To you who are endowed with valour, she is faithful by speech, by intention of thought and intellect and even by glance."
data.anv: सुवृत्ता of good conduct, शुभा auspicious, वृत्तशौण्डीर endowed with valour, त्वाम् you, वाचा speech, न अत्यचरत् by intention, मनसा in the mind, न not, बुद्ध्या by intellect, नैव or else, चक्षुषा च even with eyes
data.md: Neither by words, mind, understanding nor eyes, she, good-natured and beautiful-has deviated from you who has got a good character and is heroic.

data.v: रावणेनापनीतैषा वीर्योत्सिक्तेन रक्षसा । त्वया विरहिता दीना विवशा निर्जनाद्वनात् ।।
data.es: "When she was lonely, piteous, having no control, Rakshasa Ravana, who was proud of his valour abducted her from the forest when no one was there."
data.anv: त्वया you, विरहिता lonely, दीना piteous, विवशा having no control, एषा she, वीर्योसतिक्तेन proud of valour, रक्षसा Rakshasa, रावणेन by Ravana, निर्जनात् when no one was there, वनात् from the forest, अपनीता abducted
data.md: She was in the solitary forest separated from you, poorly and having no control over herself and hence she was carried away by the Raksasa Rāvana having enough prowess in him.

data.v: रुद्धा चान्तःपुरे गुप्ता त्वक्चित्ता त्वत्परायणा । रक्षिता राक्षसी संघैर्विकृतैर्घोरदर्शनैः ।।
data.es: "She was separated from you yet fully absorbed in you. She was kept in the gynaeceum secretly and guarded by frightful and ruthless Rakshasa women."
data.anv: त्वच्छित्ता seperated from you, त्वत्परायणा fully absorbed in you, अन्तःपुरे in the gynaeceum, रुद्धा frightful, गुप्ता secretly, घोराभिः terrific, घोरबुद्धिभिः ruthless mind, राक्षसीभिः Rakshasa women, रक्षिता to guard

data.v: प्रलोभ्यमाना विविधं भर्त्स्यमाना च मैथिली । नाचिन्तयत तद्रक्षस्त्वद्गतेनान्तरात्मना ।।
data.es: " Although Mythili was tempted, threatened also, she had set her mind on you only and not thought of that Rakshasa."
data.anv: विविधम् several, प्रलोभ्यमाना tempted, भर्त्स्यमाना threatened, मैथिली Mythili, त्वद्गतेन set her mind on you only, अन्तरात्मना in herself, तत् those, रक्षः Rakshasa, नाचिन्तयत not thought of

data.v: विशुद्धभावां निष्पापां प्रतिगृह्णीष्व राघव । न किंचिदभिधातव्यमहमाज्ञापयामि ते ।।
data.es: "Mythili is of untainted mind and a sinless one. Take her back without any reply, I am ordering you."
data.anv: विशुद्धभावाम् untainted mind, निष्पापाम् sinless, मैथिलीम् Mythili, प्रतिगृह्णीष्व take her back, किञ्चित् indeed, न अभिदातव्या without any reply, अहम् I am, ते you, आज्ञापयामि order

data.v: एवमुक्तो महातेजा धृतिमान्दृढविक्रमः । अब्रवीत्त्रिदशश्रेष्ठं रामो धर्मभृतां वरः ।।
data.es: Rama the upholder of dharma and foremost and supreme god spoke after the ruler of the world had spoken to him.
data.anv: लोकपालैः ruler of the world, इति this, उक्तः having said, लोकस्य world, स्वामी Lord, राघवः Raghava, धर्मभृताम् upholder of Dharma, वरः foremost, रामः Rama, त्रिदशश्रेष्ठान् supreme god, अब्रवीत् spoke
data.md: Being thus addressed, the highly effulgent and intelligent Rāma, of unmitigated prowess-the foremost of the pious, spoke to that best of celestials saying.

data.v: अवश्यं त्रिषु लोकेषु सीता पावनमर्हति । दीर्घकालोषिता चेयं रावणान्तःपुरे शुभा ।।
data.es: "That Sita is auspicious and has surely not done any sin is known to three worlds. But she lived long in the gynaeceum of Ravana."
data.anv: सीता Sita, अवश्यम् surely, त्रिषुलोकेषु in the three worlds, पापम् sin, न अर्हति not done, शुभा auspicious, इयम् this, रावणान्तःपुरे in the gynaeceum of Ravana, दीर्घकालोषिताहि lived for log time
data.md: Beautiful (Sītā) lived in the inner apartment of Rāvana for a long time so she needs this purification in the presence of all people.

data.v: बालिशः खलु कामात्मा रामो दशरथात्मजः । इति वक्ष्यन्ति मां सन्तो जानकीमविशोध्य हि ।।
data.es: "The people will surely say that mighty Dasharatha's son, Rama being lusty at heart has accepted Janaki without testing."
data.anv: जानकीम् Janaki, अविशोद्य without testing, दशरथात्मजः Dasharatha's son, रामः Rama, बालिशः mighty, कामात्मा lusty at heart, खलु surely, इति thus, सन्त: people, माम् me, वक्ष्यन्ति will say
data.md: If I would take the daughter of Janaka without purifying her, people would say that Rāma the son of king Dasaratha is lustful and ignorant of the morality of the people.

data.v: अनन्यहृदयां भक्तां मच्चित्तपरिरक्षणीम् । अहमप्यवगच्छामि मैथिलीं जनकात्मजाम् ।।
data.es: "I also know that Mythili is ever coming around me with undivided love and is devoted to me."
data.anv: मच्चित्तपरिवर्तिनीम् ever coming around me, जनकात्मजाम् Janaka's daughter, मैथिलीम् Mythili, अनन्यहृदयाम् undivided in her love, भक्ताम् devoted, अहमपि to me, अवगच्छामि I also know
data.md: I know it full well that Maithili, the daughter of king Janaka, has her mind devoted to me and has not given it to any one (else).

data.v: प्रत्ययार्थं तु लोकानां त्रयाणां सत्यसंश्रयः । उपेक्षे चापि वैदेहीं प्रविशन्तीं हुताशनम् ।।
data.es: " As I am a follower of truth only, to convince the three worlds I was disregarding Vaidehi entering fire."
data.anv: सत्यसंश्रयःfollower of truth, त्रयाणाम् three worlds, लोकानाम् in the world, प्रत्ययार्थम् to convince, हुताशनम् fire, प्रविशन्तीम् entering fire, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, उपेक्षेचापिI was disregarding

data.v: इमामपि विशालाक्षीं रक्षितां स्वेन तेजसा । रावणो नातिवर्तेत वेलामिव महोदधिः ।।
data.es: "Naturally she is selfeffulgent and can protect herself. Will Ravana be able to violate broad eyed Janakijust as the great ocean can't cross the bounds."
data.anv: स्वेनतेजसा selfeffulgent, रक्षिताम् can protect herself, इमाम् her, विशालाक्षीम् broadeyed, महोदधिः great ocean, वेलामिव bounds, रावणः Ravana, नातिवर्तेत not violate
data.md: As the ocean cannot go beyond its banks so Răvaņa could not approach her having expansive eyes protected by virtue of her own chastity.

data.v: न हि शक्तः स दुष्टात्मा मनसापि हि मैथिलीम् । प्रधर्षयितुमप्राप्तां दीप्तामग्निशिखामिव ।।
data.es: "It could not be possible for the evil minded Rakshasa to access or lay thoughts on Mythili who was glowing like flames of fire."
data.anv: सुदुष्टात्मा evil minded, अप्राप्याम् inaccessible, मैथिलीम् Mythili, दीप्ताम् glowing, अग्निशिखामिव like flaming fire, मनसापि in thought also, प्रधर्षयितुम् exhibiting, न हिचशक्तः not possible
data.md: The greatly vicious-souled one could not even by his mind get Maithili, who was beyond his reach like to the burning flame of fire.

data.v: नेयमर्हति चैश्वर्यं रावणान्तःपुरे शुभा । अनन्या हि मया सीतां भास्करेण प्रभा यथा ।।
data.es: " Auspicious Sita would not have cared for the fortunes in the gynaeceum of Ravana. She is just like the radiance of the sun attached to the sun, attached to me and none other."
data.anv: शुभा auspicious, इयम् she, रावणान्तःपुरे in the gynaeceum of Ravana, ऐश्वर्यम् fortune, नार्हति, सीता Sita, भास्करेण even sun, प्रभायथा like the radiance, मया by me, अनन्याहि other than
data.md: Her mind could not have been moved although she lived in the inner apartment of Rāvaņa-she belongs to none else; Sītā is mine as the rays belong to the Sun.

data.v: विशुद्धा त्रिषु लोकेषु मैथिली जनकात्मजा । न हि हातुमियं शक्या कीर्तिरात्मवता यथा ।।
data.es: "Mythili is unsullied in the three worlds. Renouncing her is not feasible just as fame and as she is like my own self."
data.anv: जनकात्मजा Janaka's daughter, मैथिली Mythili, त्रिषुलोकेषु in the three worlds, विशुध्धा unsullied, आत्मवता from self, कीर्तिःयथा like fame, मया by me, विहातुम् to renounce, न शक्या not feasible
data.md: Maithili-the daughter of Janaka has been purified before the three worlds-So I am incapable of renouncing her as a self controlled person cannot forsake his (own ) reputation.

data.v: अवश्यं च मया कार्यं सर्वेषां वो वचो हितम् । स्निग्धानां लोकमान्यानामेवं च ब्रुवतां हितम् ।।
data.es: "You are worship worthy of the world and loving people advising me in this way. Your words of good advice are good to all and for me. I will certainly follow."
data.anv: स्निग्धानाम् loving, लोकनाथानाम् worship worthy of the world, एवम् in this way, हितम् good advice, वदताम् speaking, वःसर्वेषाम् to all, हितम् good, वचःwords, मया by me, अवश्यम् certainly, कार्यम् will do
data.md: It behove me to carry out the well meaning words of you all the lords of people who have spoken them out of affection.

data.v: इतीदमुक्त्वा वचनं महाबलैः; प्रशस्यमानः स्वकृतेन कर्मणा । समेत्य रामः प्रियया महाबलः; सुखं सुखार्होऽनुबभूव राघवः ।।
data.md: Saying this, the victorious, highly powerful, well renowned Rāghava, worthy of enjoying happiness, and having his praise chanted in consequence of his noble action, regaining his spouse, attained to happiness.

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा शुभं वाक्यं राघवेण सुभाषितम् । इदं शुभतरं वाक्यं व्याजहार महेश्वरः ।।
data.es: On hearing the sweet reply of Raghava, Lord Maheswara delivered an auspicious message.
data.anv: राघवेण by Raghava, अनुभाषितम् sweet reply, एतत् this, शुभम् auspicious, वाक्यम् reply, श्रुत्वा hearing, महेश्वरः Lord Maheswara, ततः then, शुभतरम् auspicious, वाक्यम् words, व्याजहार delivered
data.md: Hearing those excellent words uttered by Raghava, Mahesvara (Siva) spoke far more important words.

data.v: पुष्कराक्ष महाबाहो महावक्षः परंतप । दिष्ट्या कृतमिदं कर्म त्वया शस्त्रभृतां वर ।।
data.es: "O Lotuseyed, mighty armed, broadchested, a subduer of enemies, by good luck you have performed this action."
data.anv: पुष्कराक्ष lotus eyed, महाबाहो mighty armed, महावक्षः broadchested, परन्तपम् subduer of enemies, वर choicest, दिष्ट्या by good luck, इदंकर्म this deed, त्वया by you, कृतम् performed
data.md: O you having lotus-eyes, O you having huge arms and a spacious breast, O you the slayer of enemies, O you the foremost of the pious-it is a good fortune that this has been done by you.

data.v: दिष्ट्या सर्वस्य लोकस्य प्रवृद्धं दारुणं तमः । अपावृत्तं त्वया संख्ये राम रावणजं भयम् ।।
data.es: "The dread of Ravana in all the worlds which caused gloom and fear has been fortunately removed by you in the war."
data.anv: राम Rama, सर्वस्य all, लोकस्य worlds, रावणजम् dread born of Ravana, भयम् fear, प्रवृद्धम् gloom, दारुणम् fierce, तमःhim, दिष्ट्या fortunately, त्वया by you, सङ्ख्ये in the war, अपावृत्तम् covered
data.md: It is by good fortune, O Rama, the dreadful Rāghava, has been removed by you in the encounter.

data.v: आश्वास्य भरतं दीनं कौसल्यां च यशस्विनीम् । कैकेयीं च सुमित्रां च दृष्ट्वा लक्ष्मणमातरम् ।।
प्राप्य राज्यमयोध्यायां नन्दयित्वा सुहृज्जनम् । इक्ष्वाकूणां कुले वंशं स्थापयित्वा महाबल ।।
इष्ट्वा तुरगमेधेन प्राप्य चानुत्तमं यशः । ब्राह्मणेभ्यो धनं दत्त्वा त्रिदिवं गन्तुमर्हसि ।।
एष राजा विमानस्थः पिता दशरथस्तव । काकुत्स्थ मानुषे लोके गुरुस्तव महायशाः ।।
data.es: "O Kakuthsa! Here is your father, teacher in the mortal world, king Dasharatha seated in the aerial car."
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ Kakuthsa, मानुषेलोके in this mortal world, तव your, गुरुः teacher, तव your, पिता father, महायशाः renowned, एषःthis, राजा king, दशरथः Dasharatha, विमानस्थः in the aerial car
data.md: This king Dasaratha stationed on the car is your father. He was your superior on this earth, OKakutstha.

data.v: इन्द्रलोकं गतः श्रीमांस्त्वया पुत्रेण तारितः । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा त्वमेनमभिवादय ।।
data.es: "Liberated by you, his son, the glorious emperor has reached Indra's world. You with your brother Lakshmana offer your salutations to him."
data.anv: पुत्रेण by his son, त्वया by you, तारितः liberated, श्रीमान् glorious, इन्द्रलोकम् world of Indra, गतः reached, भ्रात्रा brother, लक्ष्मणेनसह with Lakshmana, त्वम् you, एनम् in this way, अभिवादय offer your salutations
data.md: Obtaining you as his son, that graceful (king) has repaired to the region of Indra. Do you bow to him with your brother Lakşmaņa.

data.v: महादेववचः श्रुत्वा काकुत्स्थः सहलक्ष्मणः । विमानशिखरस्थस्य प्रणाममकरोत्पितुः ।।
data.md: Hearing the words of Mahadeva, Raghava, along with Laksmana, bowed to their father who was seated on the top of the car.

data.v: दीप्यमानं स्वयां लक्ष्म्या विरजोऽम्बरधारिणम् । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा ददर्श पितरं प्रभुः ।।
data.es: Raghava along with Lakshmana offered salutations to his father seated on top of the aerial chariot after listening to Lord MahaDeva.
data.anv: सहलक्ष्मणः along with Lakshmana, राघवः Raghava, महादेववचः Lord MahaDeva's words, श्रुत्वा listening, विमानशिखरस्थस्य seated on top of the aerial car, पितुः father, प्रणामम् salutations, चकार offered
data.md: He with Lakşmaņa beheld their father shining in his own effulgence and wearing an unsullied cloth.

data.v: हर्षेण महताविष्टो विमानस्थो महीपतिः । प्राणैः प्रियतरं दृष्ट्वा पुत्रं दशरथस्तदा ।।
data.es: Then Dasaratha, the ruler of the world, seated in an elevated seat in the aerial car, seeing his son who was dearer than life to him, extremely rejoiced and made Raghava sit on his lap, embraced him, and started speaking as follows.
data.anv: तदा then, विमानस्थः aerial car's, महीपतिः ruler of the world, प्रभुः Lord, वरासनगतः elevated seat, दशरथः Dasharatha, प्राणैः life, प्रियतरम् dearer, पुत्रम् son, दृष्टवा seeing, महता extremely, हर्षेण rejoiced, आविष्टः making him sit, अङ्के on his lap, आरोप्य seated, बाहुभ्याम् many, सम्परिष्वज्य embracing, ततः these, वाक्यम् words, समाददे started
data.md: Thereupon beholding his son dearer than his life, attaining great delight (in consequence thereof) placing him on his lap and embracing him with his arms, the great king Dasaratha, having long arms and seated on an excellent seat in the car, said.

data.v: आरोप्याङ्कं महाबाहुर्वरासनगतः प्रभुः । बाहुभ्यां संपरिष्वज्य ततो वाक्यं समाददे ।।
data.es: Then Dasaratha, the ruler of the world, seated in an elevated seat in the aerial car, seeing his son who was dearer than life to him, extremely rejoiced and made Raghava sit on his lap, embraced him, and started speaking as follows.
data.anv: तदा then, विमानस्थः aerial car's, महीपतिः ruler of the world, प्रभुः Lord, वरासनगतः elevated seat, दशरथः Dasharatha, प्राणैः life, प्रियतरम् dearer, पुत्रम् son, दृष्टवा seeing, महता extremely, हर्षेण rejoiced, आविष्टः making him sit, अङ्के on his lap, आरोप्य seated, बाहुभ्याम् many, सम्परिष्वज्य embracing, ततः these, वाक्यम् words, समाददे started
data.md: Thereupon beholding his son dearer than his life, attaining great delight (in consequence thereof) placing him on his lap and embracing him with his arms, the great king Dasaratha, having long arms and seated on an excellent seat in the car, said.

data.v: न मे स्वर्गो बहुमतः संमानश्च सुरर्षिभिः । त्वया राम विहीनस्य सत्यं प्रतिशृणोमि ते ।।
data.es: "Rama separated from you, even the suras and sages honouring me in heaven does not give me happiness. It is true and I promise."
data.anv: राम Rama, त्वया by you, विहीनस्य having got separated, मे me, स्वर्गः heaven, न बहुमतः by several, सुरर्षभैः suras, सम्मानश्च honouring, ते you, सत्यम् true, प्रतिशृणोमि promise
data.md: I am now in heaven and am equal with the celestials, but without you, O Rāma, I do not like it-this is true-I do swear by you.

data.v: कैकेय्या यानि चोक्तानि वाक्यानि वदतां वर । तव प्रव्राजनार्थानि स्थितानि हृदये मम ।।
data.es: "Those utterances of Kaikeyi with a motive to send you on exile are still hurting my heart, O Best among speakers!"
data.anv: वदताम् speaking, वर best, तव your, प्रव्राजनार्थानि send you with a motive, यानि those, वाक्यानि utterances, कैकेय्या of Kaikeyi, उक्तानि spoken, तानि those, मम my, हृदये heart, स्थितानि still hurt
data.md: O you the foremost of those skilled in speech, I have still in my mind the words which were uttered by Kaikeyi for sending you away to the woods.

data.v: त्वां तु दृष्ट्वा कुशलिनं परिष्वज्य सलक्ष्मणम् । अद्य दुःखाद्विमुक्तोऽस्मि नीहारादिव भास्करः ।।
data.es: "Seeing you with Lakshmana and embracing you makes me happy freed from grief just as the sun freed from mist."
data.anv: सलक्ष्मणम् with Lakshmana, त्वाम् you, कुशलिनम् happily, दृष्टवा seeing, परिष्वज्य embracing, अद्य now, भास्करः sun, नीहारादिव freed from mist, दुःखात् from grief, विमुक्तः freed अस्मि I am
data.md: Beholding you all well and embracing you with Lakşmaņa I am now shorn of grief like to the Sun, devoid of dues.

data.v: तारितोऽहं त्वया पुत्र सुपुत्रेण महात्मना । अष्टावक्रेण धर्मात्मा तारितो ब्राह्मणो यथा ।।
data.es: "Son! I am liberated by you today, my great son, just as Kahola who was set on righteousness was liberated by Ashtavakra."
data.anv: पुत्र son, महात्मना great self, सुपुत्रेण by his son, त्वया by you, अष्टावक्रेण Ashatvakra, धर्मात्मा righteous, कहोलः Kahola, ब्राह्मणोयथा like the brahmin, अहम् I, तारितः liberated
data.md: I have been emancipated, O my son, through you-a good and high-souled son, as the virtuoussouled Brāhmaṇa Kahola was by Aștāvakra.

data.v: इदानीं च विजानामि यथा सौम्य सुरेश्वरैः । वधार्थं रावणस्येह विहितं पुरुषोत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "O gentle son! I did not know that the ruler of gods had sent you for the destruction of Ravana, O excellent one."
data.anv: सौम्य gentle, पुरुषोत्तम excellent, इह here, रावणस्य Ravana's, वधार्थम् to kill him, सुरेश्वरैः by ruler of gods, यथा so, विहितम् for destruction, इदानीं च in this form, विजानामि I did not know
data.md: O gentle one, I have heard from the celestials, (that you are) the excellent Puruşa in the guise (of a man) for the destruction of Rävaņa.

data.v: सिद्धार्था खलु कौसल्या या त्वां राम गृहं गतम् । वनान्निवृत्तं संहृष्टा द्रक्ष्यते शत्रुसूदन ।।
data.es: "Rama! Kausalya will see you, as an accomplished one, as a destroyer of enemies, on returning home from the forest and will be highly rejoiced."
data.anv: राम Rama, वनात् in the forest, निवृत्तम् returned, शत्रुसूदनम् destroyer of enemy, गृहम् house, गतम् returned, त्वाम् you, या she, संहृष्टा highly rejoiced, द्रक्ष्यते will see you, कौसल्या Kausalya, सिद्धार्थाखलु accomplished as you are
data.md: Blessed is Kausalyā, O Rāma, who shall be greatly delighted, on beholding you, the slayer of enemies, gone home from the forest.

data.v: सिद्धार्थाः खलु ते राम नरा ये त्वां पुरीं गतम् । जलार्द्रमभिषिक्तं च द्रक्ष्यन्ति वसुधाधिपम् ।।
data.es: "On reaching the city and consecrated in the kingdom as ruler of the world, people will see you as an accomplished person."
data.anv: राम Rama, पुरीम् in the city, गतम् on reaching, राज्ये kingdom, अभिषिक्तं च consecration, त्वाम् your, वसुधाधिपम् as ruler of the world, येनराः these people, द्रक्ष्यन्ते will be seeing you, ते to you, सिद्धार्था: खलु accomplished
data.md: Blessed are those men, O Rama, who shall behold you installed in the city as the king of the world.

data.v: अनुरक्तेन बलिना शुचिना धर्मचारिणा । इच्छेयं त्वामहं द्रष्टुं भरतेन समागतम् ।।
data.es: "I desire to see you reunited with mighty Bharata who is pure and follower of dharma."
data.anv: अनुरक्तेन reunited, बलिना mighty, शुचिना pure, धर्मचारिणा follower of dharma, भरतेन by Bharata, समागतम् returned, त्वाम् you, द्रष्टुम् seeing, अहम् I, इच्छेयम् desire to
data.md: I wish to behold you reconciled with Bharata, devoted powerful, pure and performing pious observances.

data.v: चतुर्दशसमाः सौम्य वने निर्यापितास्त्वया । वसता सीतया सार्धं लक्ष्मणेन च धीमता ।।
data.es: "O Gentle Rama! Fourteen years have been spent in the forest with Sita and Lakshmana after my departure from life."
data.anv: सौम्य gentle, सीतयासार्धम् along with Sita also, धीमता wise, लक्ष्मणेन च and Lakshmana, वसता living, त्वया you, चतुर्धश fourteen, समाः years, वने in the forest, निर्यातिताः after my departure from life
data.md: O gentle one, you have spent fourteen years in the forest with Sītā and Lakşmaņa.

data.v: निवृत्तवनवासोऽसि प्रतिज्ञा सफला कृता । रावणं च रणे हत्वा देवास्ते परितोषिताः ।।
data.es: "The period of your exile has been completed, my promise has been fulfilled in the battlefield and the gods have also gratified you."
data.anv: निवृत्तवनवासः period of exile completed, असि even though, त्वया you, प्रतिज्ञा promise, पूरिता fully, रणे in the battlefield, रावणम् Ravana, हत्वा death, देवताः च gods also, परितोषिताः gratified
data.md: The term of your exile is over-your promise has been fulfilled; and slaying Ravana, in the conflict you have pleased the celestials.

data.v: कृतं कर्म यशः श्लाघ्यं प्राप्तं ते शत्रुसूदन । भ्रातृभिः सह राज्यस्थो दीर्घमायुरवाप्नुहि ।।
data.anv: शत्रुसूदन overthrower of enemy, कर्म action, कृतम् done, ते you, श्लाघ्यम् praise worthy, यशः fame, प्राप्तम् attained, भ्रातृभिःसह with brother, राज्यस्थः kingdom too, दीर्घम् long, आयुः life, अवाप्नुहि enjoy
data.md: You have performed a mighty deed and attained to excellent fame, O slayer of enemies; and placed in charge of your kingdom do you with your brothers attain a long life.

data.v: इति ब्रुवाणं राजानं रामः प्राञ्जलिरब्रवीत् । कुरु प्रसादं धर्मज्ञ कैकेय्या भरतस्य च ।।
data.es: Dasaratha having spoken to Rama, offered salutations with joined palms and said," You are righteous. Be gracious to Bharata and Kaikeyi also."
data.anv: इति thus, ब्रुवाणम् having spoken, राजानम् by king Dasharatha, रामः Rama, प्राञ्जलिः salutations with joined palms, अब्रवीत् said, धर्मज्ञ righteous, कैकेय्याः Kaikeyi, भरतस्य च and brother too, प्रसादम् grace, कुरु do
data.md: The king speaking thus Rāma spoke to him with folded hands saying, “O you conversant with piety, do you be propitiated with Bharata and Kaikeyi.

data.v: सपुत्रां त्वां त्यजामीति यदुक्ता कैकयी त्वया । स शापः कैकयीं घोरः सपुत्रां न स्पृशेत्प्रभो ।।
data.es: "O Lord! You had spoken in such a way saying 'I disown a good son and Kaikeyi' and cursed. May that dreadful curse not touch your son and Kaikeyi," said Rama.
data.anv: प्रभोO Lord, सपुत्राम् good son, त्वाम् you, त्यजामीति 'I disown', त्वया by you, केकयी Kaikeyi, यत् such a way, उक्ता spoken, सः he, घोरः dreadful, शापः curse, सपुत्राम् to the good son, केकयीम् and Kaikeyi, न स्स्पृशेत् not touch
data.md: You did imprecate Kaikeyi, saying, I renounce you with your son, may not that dreadful curse visit her and her son.

data.v: स तथेति महाराजो राममुक्त्वा कृताञ्जलिम् । लक्ष्मणं च परिष्वज्य पुनर्वाक्यमुवाच ह ।।
data.es: The king (Dasharatha) saying 'so be it' and embracing Lakshmana again and saluting Rama spoke to Lakshmana as follows.
data.anv: सःमहाराजः that king, तथेति so be it, कृताञ्जलिम् saluting, रामम् Rama, उक्त्वा said, लक्ष्मणं च and Lakshmana, परिष्वज्य embracing, पुनः again, वाक्यम् words, उवाच ह spoke
data.md: Saying "so be it" to Rāma with folded hands and embracing Lakşmaņa the great king said to him.

data.v: रामं शुश्रूषता भक्त्या वैदेह्या सह सीतया । कृता मम महाप्रीतिः प्राप्तं धर्मफलं च ते ।।
data.es: "You have served with devotion to Rama and Sita and made me very happy. By this task you have earned the merit of righteousness."
data.anv: वैदेह्या Vaidehi, सीतयासह along with Sita, रामम् Rama, भक्त्या devotion, शुश्रूषता, मम me, महाप्रीतिः very happy, कृता did, ते to you, धर्मफलं च merit of righteous task, प्राप्तम् attained

data.v: धर्मं प्राप्स्यसि धर्मज्ञ यशश्च विपुलं भुवि । रामे प्रसन्ने स्वर्गं च महिमानं तथैव च ।।
data.es: "O knower of dharma! If Rama is pleased, extensive fame as well as heaven and supreme glory will be attained on this earth."
data.anv: धर्मज्ञ knower of dharma, धर्मम् dharma, भुवि on this earth, विपुलम् extensive, यशश्च fame, प्राप्स्यसि will attain, रामे by Rama, प्रसन्ने pleased, स्वर्गं च heaven, उत्तमम् best, महिमानम् supreme glory
data.md: O you conversant with piety and fame on this earth, you shall attain to heaven and excellent state there.

data.v: रामं शुश्रूष भद्रं ते सुमित्रानन्दवर्धन । रामः सर्वस्य लोकस्य शुभेष्वभिरतः सदा ।।
data.es: "O Lakshmana, the enhancer of Sumithra's joy, 'Be auspicious. Rama will always remain good in the service of the three worlds."
data.anv: सुमित्रानन्दवर्धन enhancer of Sumithra's joy, ते you, भद्रम् be auspicious, रामम् to Rama, शुश्रूष service, रामः Rama, सदा always, सर्वलोकस्य in all the worlds, सुभेषु good, अभिरतः will ever remain
data.md: O you the enhancer of Sumitra's joy-do you attend upon Rāma; may good betide you; Rāma is ever engaged in the welfare of all beings.

data.v: एते सेन्द्रास्त्रयो लोकाः सिद्धाश्च परमर्षयः । अभिगम्य महात्मानमर्चन्ति पुरुषोत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "This Indra and also Siddhas, supreme sages who are great souls pay respects to Rama and worship him."
data.anv: सेन्द्राः Indra, एते this, लोकाः world, सिद्धाश्च Siddhas also, परमर्षयः supreme sages, महात्मानम् great souls, पुरुषोत्तमम् supreme, अभिगम्य pay respects, अर्चन्ति worship
data.md: All these celestials headed by Indra, Siddhas and Great saints, bowing to this high-souled and excellent Purusa, worship him.

data.v: एतत्तदुक्तमव्यक्तमक्षरं ब्रह्मनिर्मितम् । देवानां हृदयं सौम्य गुह्यं रामः परंतपः ।।
data.es: "O Gentle! Rama, the tormentor of enemies is the unmanifest and imperishable secret, is Brahma alone. This is created by Brahma. It is the secret in the heart of gods."
data.anv: सौम्य gentle, परन्तप tormentor of enemies, अव्यक्तम् unmanifest, अक्षरम् imperishable, देवानाम् gods, हृदयम् heart, गुह्यम् secret, तत् that alone, एतत् this, ब्रह्म Brahma, रामः Rama, निर्मितम् created, उक्तम् spoke
data.md: Rāma, the subduer of foes, is the indescribable and undecaying letter Brahmā, which has been described in the Vedas) as the heart and secret of the celestials.

data.v: अवाप्तं धर्मचरणं यशश्च विपुलं त्वया । रामं शुश्रूषता भक्त्या वैदेह्या सह सीतया ।।
data.es: "Videha's Sita, you have also earned fame by serving Rama with devotion and following the righteous path."
data.anv: वैदेह्या Videha's, सीतयासह Sita also, एनम् in this manner, भक्त्या with devotion, शुश्रूषता serving, त्वया your, धर्माचरणम् righteous path, अवाप्तम् earned, विपुलम् great, यशश्च fame
data.md: For serving him along with Sītā, the daughter of king Videha, you have attained piety and excellent fame.

data.v: स तथोक्त्वा महाबाहुर्लक्ष्मणं प्राञ्जलिं स्थितम् । उवाच राजा धर्मात्मा वैदेहीं वचनं शुभम् ।।
कर्तव्यो न तु वैदेहि मन्युस्त्यागमिमं प्रति । रामेण त्वद्विशुद्ध्यर्थं कृतमेतद्धितैषिणा ।।
data.es: "In the event of Rama abandoning you, resentment should not be shown in this way. It is your duty to endure. Rama himself has done this to prove your purity."
data.anv: वैदेही Vaidehi, इमम् this manner, त्यागंप्रति in the event of leaving, मन्युः resentment, न तु not you, कर्तव्यः duty, एतद्धिकतैषिणा enduring this way, रामेय by Rama itself, इदम् thus, विशुध्यर्थम् to prove your purity, कृतम् has done
data.md: It does not behove you, O Vaidehi, to be enraged (with Rāma) for renouncing you; for purifying you this was done by him ever wishing your welfare.

data.v: न त्वं सुभ्रु समाधेया पतिशुश्रूवणं प्रति । अवश्यं तु मया वाच्यमेष ते दैवतं परम् ।।
data.es: "You need not be told about the service to your husband. Nevertheless, I am giving instruction. This Rama is supreme god for you."
data.anv: त्वम् you, भर्तृशुश्रूषणंप्रति about the service to your husband, न समाधेयाकामम् not to told, तु you, मया by me, अवश्यम् surely, वाच्यम् instructed, एषः like this, ते you, परम् supreme, दैवतम् god
data.md: Though there is no necessity for giving you any instruction as regards your duty towards your husband-still I should say that he is your great god.

data.v: इति प्रतिसमादिश्य पुत्रौ सीतां तथा स्नुषाम् । इन्द्रलोकं विमानेन ययौ दशरथो ज्वलन् ।।
data.es: Having admonished the two glowing sons, and Sita, Dasaratha went by aerial car to the world of Indra.
data.anv: राघवः Raghava, दशरथः Dasharatha's, ज्वलन् glowing, पुत्रौ sons, सीतां च and Sita, इति thus, प्रतिसमादिश्य admonished, विमानेन by the aerial car, इन्द्रलोकम् world of Indra, ययौ went
data.md: Having thus instructed his two sons and Sītā, he repaired, in his car, to the region of Indra.

data.v: प्रतिप्रयाते काकुत्स्थे महेन्द्रः पाकशासनः । अब्रवीत्परमप्रीतो राघवं प्राञ्जलिं स्थितम् ।।
data.es: Mahendra, the tamer of demon Paka, spoke very affectionately to Rama, who stood with joined palms before Dasharatha who had returned.
data.anv: काकुत्स्थे Kakuthsa, Dasharatha प्रतिप्रयाते returned, पाकशासनः the tamer of demon Paka, महेन्द्रः Mahendra, परमप्रीतः very affectionately, प्राञ्जलिम् saluting with joined palms, स्थितम् stood, राघवम् Raghava, अब्रवीत् spoke
data.md: Dasaratha having repaired, Mahendra greatly delighted spoke to Rāghava, stationed there with folded hands, saying.

data.v: अमोघं दर्शनं राम तवास्माकं परंतप । प्रीतियुक्तोऽस्मि तेन त्वं ब्रूहि यन्मनसेच्छसि ।।
data.es: "O Rama, a bull among men! Your sight was amazing, and we are happy. Please tell us the desire in your mind?"
data.anv: नरर्षभ bull among men, राम Rama, तव your, अस्माकम् yourself, दर्शनम् sight, अमोघम् amazing, प्रीतियुक्ताः happy, स्म in your, तेन so, मनसा in your mind, यत् that which, ईप्सितम् desiring, त्वम् you, ब्रूहि may tell
data.md: O Rama,Oforemost of men, this our presence here, must not be fruitless, we are pleased-do you ask for what you wish.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु काकुत्स्थः प्रत्युवाच कृताञ्जलिः । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा सीतया चापि भार्यया ।।
data.es: When Rama had spoken in the aforesaid manner, Vibheeshana replied" O son of the ruler of the earth! I will make you reach Ayodhya in a day."
data.anv: एवम् in that manner, उक्तः spoken, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, काकुत्स्थम् to Kakuthsa, प्रत्युवाच replied back, पार्थिवात्मज son of ruler of the earth, त्वाम् you, तांपुरीम् your city, अह्ना will, प्रापयिष्यामि make you reach

data.v: यदि प्रीतिः समुत्पन्ना मयि सर्वसुरेश्वर । वक्ष्यामि कुरु मे सत्यं वचनं वदतां वर ।।
data.es: "O Lord of gods, you are one who is good at expression. If happiness has risen in, you please make my words true."
data.anv: वदतांवर good at expression, विबुधेश्वर Lord of gods, ते you, मयि my, प्रीतिः happiness, समुत्पन्नायदि has risen, मे my, वचनम् words, सत्यम् true, कुरु make it
data.md: O lord of the celestials, O you the foremost of those skilled in speech, if you are propitiated with me, I shall pray for (my wished for object); do you grant it.

data.v: मम हेतोः पराक्रान्ता ये गता यमसादनम् । ते सर्वे जीवितं प्राप्य समुत्तिष्ठन्तु वानराः ।।
data.es: "The Vanaras have fought for my cause and reached the abode of Yama. Make them rise up and get them back to life."
data.anv: ममहेतोः for my cause, पराक्रान्ताः who fought, ये those, वानराः Vanaras, यमसादनम् abode of Yama, गताः reached, तेसर्वे all of them, जीवितम् life, प्राप्य get back, समुततिष्ठन्तु make them rise up
data.md: Let all these highly powerful monkeys, who have been despatched to the abode of Death, on my account, regaining their life, stand up.

data.v: मत्प्रियेष्वभिरक्ताश्च न मृत्युं गणयन्ति च । त्वत्प्रसादात्समेयुस्ते वरमेतदहं वृणे ।।
data.es: "They were fond of doing and not counted death. I seek your grace to give a boon to relieve all of them from death."
data.anv: मत्प्रियेषु at death, अभिरक्ताः fond of doing, ये they, मृत्युम् death, न गणयन्ति not counted, ते they, त्वत्प्रासादात् by your grace, समेयुः in war, अहम् I, एतम् all of them, वरम् boon, वृणे seek
data.md: May all those, by your favour, who were ever devoted to me and did not care for death (even) regain their life-this is the boon I pray for.

data.v: नीरुजान्निर्व्रणांश्चैव संपन्नबलपौरुषान् । गोलाङ्गूलांस्तथैवर्क्षान्द्रष्टुमिच्छामि मानद ।।
data.es: "Bestower of honour! I wish to see the longtailed Vanaras, and Bears rid of pain and death, enriched with strength and courage."
data.anv: मानद bestower of honour, गोलाङ्गूलान् longtailed monkeys, तथा similarly, वक्षांश्च Bears, नीरुजः purified without any pain, निर्व्रणांश्चैव from death, सम्पन्नबलपौरुषान् enriched with strength and courage, द्रष्टुम् to see, इच्छामि desire
data.md: O conferror of honour, I wish to see all these monkeys, Golarigālas and bears, pale and hurt, unheart and gifted with strength and prowess like before.

data.v: अकाले चापि मुख्यानि मूलानि च फलानि च । नद्यश्च विमलास्तत्र तिष्ठेयुर्यत्र वानराः ।।
data.es: "Let the location where Vanaras lived, have flowers, roots, fruits even though out of season and rivers with pure water."
data.anv: वानराः Vanaras, यत्र there, तिष्ठेयुः living, तत्र there, अकालेचापि even though out of season, पुष्पाणि flowers, मूलानि च and roots, फलानि च fruits, विमलाः pure, नद्यश्च rivers
data.md: Let there be flowers, fruits and roots, even out of season wherever these monkeys shall live and let rivers there be full of clear water.

data.v: श्रुत्वा तु वचनं तस्य राघवस्य महात्मनः । महेन्द्रः प्रत्युवाचेदं वचनं प्रीतिलक्षणम् ।।
data.es: Hearing high souled Raghava's words, Mahendra in turn replied as follows.
data.anv: महात्मनः great self, तस्य his, राघवस्य Raghava's, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वातु hearing also, महेन्द्रः Mahendra, प्रीतिसंयुतम् replied, इदम् this, वचनम् words, प्रत्युवाच in turn
data.md: Hearing those words of the high-souled Rāghava Mehendra replied with words instinct with delight.

data.v: महानयं वरस्तात त्वयोक्तो रघुनन्दन । समुत्थास्यन्ति हरयः सुप्ता निद्राक्षये यथा ।।
data.es: The monkeys duly healed, so also from death, enriched with strength and power rose up like rising from sleep.
data.anv: हरयः monkeys, नीरुजः healed, निर्व्रणाश्चैव from death, सम्पन्नबलपौरुषाः enriched with strength and power, सुप्ताः sleeping, निद्राक्ष्येयथा like rising from sleep, समुत्थास्यन्ति rise up
data.md: Let the monkeys gifted with their pristine strength and prowess rise up unhurt and healthy as if after the end of sleep.

data.v: सुहृद्भिर्बान्धवैश्चैव ज्ञातिभिः स्वजनेन च । सर्व एव समेष्यन्ति संयुक्ताः परया मुदा ।।
data.es: "Let all in that way happily get reunited and highly rejoiced, with relatives, own clan and own people get united."
data.anv: सर्वेएव all in that way, परया, मुदा happily, सम्युक्ताः reunited, सुहृद्भिः highly rejoiced, बान्धवैश्चैव with relatives, ज्ञातिभिः own clan, स्वजनेन own people, समेष्यन्ति will get united
data.md: Being reconciled with their friends, relatives and kinsmen let them attain to excellent joy.

data.v: अकाले पुष्पशबलाः फलवन्तश्च पादपाः । भविष्यन्ति महेष्वास नद्यश्च सलिलायुताः ।।
data.es: The trees will be with blossoms and fruits even though it is unseasonal. The rivers will remain with waters.
data.anv: महेष्वास wielder of great bow, पादपाः trees, अकाले unseason, पुष्पशबलाः with blossom, फलवन्तश्च and with fruits, भविष्यन्ति will be, नद्यश्च rivers, सलिलायुताः remain with water
data.md: O you the wielder of a huge bow, all the trees shall be filled with flowers and fruits and all the rivers shall be filled with water even out of season (wherever they shall live).

data.v: सव्रणैः प्रथमं गात्रैः संवृतैर्निव्रणैः पुनः । बभूवुर्वानराः सर्वे किमेतदिति विस्मितः ।।
data.es: All the army of Vanaras healed from the wounds, who were earlier covered with wounds and all the dead monkeys together rose up like getting up from sleep. They were amazed and started saying 'What happened'!
data.anv: ततः then, सर्वे all, हरियूथपाः army of Vanaras, प्रथमम् earlier, सव्रणैः of the wounds, इदानीम् these, निर्व्रणैः dead, समैः united, गात्रैः limbs, सुप्त्वेव having slept, समुथतिताः like getting up, सर्वे all, वानराः Vanaras, एतत् these, किंनु What happened, इति this, विस्मिताः amazed, बभूवुः became

data.v: काकुत्स्थं परिपूर्णार्थं दृष्ट्वा सर्वे सुरोत्तमाः । ऊचुस्ते प्रथमं स्तुत्वा स्तवार्हं सहलक्ष्मणम् ।।
data.es: Seeing all of them fully accomplished, the best of Suras very affectionately praised Rama and Lakshmana and spoke.
data.anv: सर्वे all, सुरोत्तमाः best of suras, परिपूर्णार्थम् fully accomplished, काकुत्थ्सम् to Kakuthsa, दृष्टवाseeing, परमप्रीताः very affectionately, सलक्ष्मणम् and Lakshmana, रामम् Rama, स्तुत्वा praised, अब्रुवन् spoken

data.v: गच्छायोध्यामितो वीर विसर्जय च वानरान् । मैथिलीं सान्त्वयस्वैनामनुरक्तां तपस्विनीम् ।।
data.es: "King, return from here to Ayodhya leaving the monkeys. Reassure Mythili, who is very dear to you and an illustrious one."
data.anv: राजन् king, इतः from here, अयोध्याम् Ayodhya, गच्छ return, वानरान् Vanaras, विसर्जय च leaving, अनुरक्ताम् very dear, यशस्विनीम् illustrious, एनाम् this, मैथिलीम् Mythili, सान्त्वयस्व assuring

data.v: भ्रातरं पश्य भरतं त्वच्छोकाद्व्रतचारिणम् । अभिषेचय चात्मानं पौरान्गत्वा प्रहर्षय ।।
data.es: "Subduer of enemies! See your brothers, great souls Bharata and Satrughna devoted to you who are in grief due to your separation, see your mothers. Get consecrated. People will rejoice.
data.anv: परन्तप subduer of enemies, त्वच्छोकात् grief due to separation from you, व्रतचारिणम् devoted, भ्रातरम् brothers, भरतम् Bharata, महात्मानम् great souls, शत्रुघ्नं च and Satrughna, सर्वाः all, मात्रूः mothers, पश्य see, आत्मानम् you, अभिषेचय consecrate, गत्वा reaching, पौरान् people, प्रहर्षय rejoice

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तमामन्त्र्य रामं सौमित्रिणा सह । विमानैः सूर्यसंकाशैर्हृष्टा जग्मुः सुरा दिवम् ।।
data.es: The thousand eyed Indra, having spoken in that way to Rama and Saumithri, delighted, they returned to heaven in an aerial car with Suras.
data.anv: सहस्राक्षः thousand eyed Indra, सौमित्रिणासह with Saumithri, रामम् Rama, एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having spoken, हृष्टः delighted, सुरैःसह with Suras, सूर्यसङ्काशैः resembling sun, विमानैः aerial car, ययौ returned
data.md: Having thus addressed Rāma along with Laksmana, the thousand eyed Deity, delighted, went away along with the celestials, in their cars resembling the Sun (in brilliance.

data.v: अभिवाद्य च काकुत्स्थः सर्वांस्तांस्त्रिदशोत्तमान् । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा वासमाज्ञापयत्तदा ।।
data.es: Then greeting all the jewels among gods present there, accompanied by brother Lakshmana, Kakuthsa Rama ordered all Vanaras to go home and rest.
data.anv: तदा then, भ्रात्रा brother, लक्ष्मणेनसह with Lakshmana, काकुत्स्थ : Kakuthsa, तान् those, सर्वान् all, त्रिदशोत्तमान् jewels among gods, अभिवाद्य greeting, वासम् home, आज्ञापयत् ordered
data.md: Saluting all the celestials, Kākutstha, with his brother Lakşmaņa, ordered the encampment of the army.

data.v: ततस्तु सा लक्ष्मणरामपालिता; महाचमूर्हृष्टजना यशस्विनी । श्रिया ज्वलन्ती विरराज सर्वतो; निशाप्रणीतेव हि शीतरश्मिना ।।
data.md: Thereupon that famous and well-pleased huge army of the monkeys protected by Råma and Lakşmaņa, appeared resplendent on all sides like to a night beautified with the rays of the Moon.

data.v: तां रात्रिमुषितं रामं सुखोत्थितमरिंदमम् । अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं जयं पृष्ट्वा विभीषणः ।।
data.es: Rising in the morning after comfortable rest that night, Vibheeshana saw Rama the subduer of enemies, offered salutations and asked him of the victory and spoke.
data.anv: ताम् them, रात्रिम् night, उषितम् rising in the morning, सुखोत्थिम् comfortably, अरिन्दमम् subduer of enemies, रामम् Rama, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, जयम् victory, पृष्टवा asked, प्राज्ञलिः salutations, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke
data.md: Rāma having spent that night happily and risen up the next morning, Vibhisana, chanting his victory, spoke to that slayer of foes, with folded hands, saying.

data.v: स्नानानि चाङ्गरागाणि वस्त्राण्याभरणानि च । चन्दनानि च दिव्यानि माल्यानि विविधानि च ।।
data.es: These lotus petal eyed women well versed in decoration are at your service. They are willing to assist you in bath. There are cosmetics for anointing your body, and clothes as well as ornaments, sandal paste etc. for you. There are garlands of several types here.
data.anv: राघव Raghava, अलङ्कारविदः well versed in decoration, पद्मनिभेक्षणाः lotus petal eyed, मनार्यः at your service, स्नानानि for bath, अङ्गरागाणि cosmetics for anointing, वस्त्राणि clothes, आभरणानि च ornaments, चन्दनानि च sandal etc, दिव्यानि wonderful, विविधानि several types, माल्यानि च garlands, उपस्थिताः are here, त्वाम् you, विधिवत् as usual, स्नापयिष्यन्ति they will give you bath
data.md: Here are various articles for bathing, pastes, clothes, ornaments, sandal and various excellent garlands.

data.v: अलंकारविदश्चेमा नार्यः पद्मनिभेक्षणाः । उपस्थितास्त्वां विधिवत्स्नापयिष्यन्ति राघव ।।
data.es: These lotus petal eyed women well versed in decoration are at your service. They are willing to assist you in bath. There are cosmetics for anointing your body, and clothes as well as ornaments, sandal paste etc. for you. There are garlands of several types here.
data.anv: राघव Raghava, अलङ्कारविदः well versed in decoration, पद्मनिभेक्षणाः lotus petal eyed, मनार्यः at your service, स्नानानि for bath, अङ्गरागाणि cosmetics for anointing, वस्त्राणि clothes, आभरणानि च ornaments, चन्दनानि च sandal etc, दिव्यानि wonderful, विविधानि several types, माल्यानि च garlands, उपस्थिताः are here, त्वाम् you, विधिवत् as usual, स्नापयिष्यन्ति they will give you bath
data.md: Here are present women having eyes like lotuses and conversant with the are of decking, Let them perform their duty, O Rāghava.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु काकुत्स्थः प्रत्युवाच विभीषणम् । हरीन्सुग्रीवमुख्यांस्त्वं स्नानेनोपनिमन्त्रय ।।
data.es: When Vibheeshana had spoken like that, Kakuthsa Rama replied 'you and monkeys headed by Sugriva bathe and come.'
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्तः spoken, काकुत्थ्सः Kakuthsa, विभीषणम् Vibheeshana, प्रत्युवाच replied, त्वम् you, सुग्रीवमुख्यान् Sugriva and other chiefs, हरीन् monkeys, स्नानेन for bath, उपनिमन्त्रय after bathe and anointing
data.md: Being thus accosted Kākutstha replied to Vibhīşaņa, saying: Do you invite all these monkeys headed by Sugrīva to bath.

data.v: स तु ताम्यति धर्मात्मा ममहेतोः सुखोचितः । सुकुमारो महाबाहुः कुमारः सत्यसंश्रवः ।।
data.es: "Mighty armed Bharata, righteous, giving up comforts of delicate body, resorting to truth is distressed for my cause."
data.anv: धर्मात्मा righteous, सुखोचितः giving up comforts, सुकुमारः delicate, महाबाहुः mighty armed, सत्यसंश्रयः resorting to truth, सःकुमार: he, ममहेतोः for my cause, ताम्यति distressed
data.md: The virtuous-souled Bharata, having huge arms and ever used to comforts, is greatly distressed on my account.

data.v: तं विना कैकेयीपुत्रं भरतं धर्मचारिणम् । न मे स्नानं बहुमतं वस्त्राण्याभरणानि च ।।
data.es: "When the virtuous Bharata, son of Kaikeyi, is not here, why do I need bath, why so many clothes and ornaments?"
data.anv: कैकयीपुत्रम् Kaikeyi's son, धर्मचारिणम् follower of virtues, तंभरतंविना without that Bharata, मे my, स्नानम् bath, न बहुमतम् why so many, स्त्राणि clothes, आभरणानि च ornaments also
data.md: Without Bharata the son of Kaikeyi, ever performing pious rites, I do not value bathing or these clothes and ornaments.

data.v: इत एव पथा क्षिप्रं प्रतिगच्छाम तां पुरीम् । अयोध्यामायतो ह्येष पन्थाः परमदुर्गमः ।।
data.es: " As it is very difficult to return to that city, think of the path to depart."
data.anv: तांपुरीम् that city, यथा as, प्रतिगच्छाम to return, एतत् these, पश्य see, अयोध्याम् Ayodhya, गच्छतः depart, एषःपन्थाः this path, परमदुर्गमःहि very difficult also
data.md: Do you so manage that we may go to the city of Ayodhyă speedity. For difficult is the way leading to Ayodhyā.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु काकुत्स्थं प्रत्युवाच विभीषणः । अह्ना त्वां प्रापयिष्यामि तां पुरीं पार्थिवात्मज ।।
data.es: Vibheeshana, having spoken that way, Vaidehi said to the Lord of Rakshasas that she would like to see him without having a bath.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्ता spoken, वैदेही Vaidehi, विभीषणम् to Vibheeshana, प्रत्युवाच replied, राक्षसेश्वर Lord of Rakshasas, अस्नात्वा without bath, भर्तारम् husband, द्रष्टुम् see, इच्छामि I desire
data.md: Being thus accosted Vibhīşaņa relied to Kākutstha, O son of the lord of earth, may good betide you, I shall soon take you to that city.

data.v: पुष्पकं नाम भद्रं ते विमानं सूर्यसंनिभम् । मम भ्रातुः कुबेरस्य रावणेनाहृतं बलात् ।।
data.es: " An aerial car called Pushpaka, a wonderful one, which closely resembles the sun, which goes according to the will of the rider has been retained with me. It was earned by Ravana from my brother Kubera in a combat. Be auspicious. O Rama, of unequal prowess, this is retained for your cause."
data.anv: अतुलविक्रम unequal prowess, सूर्यसन्निभम्, closely resembling sun कामगम् goes according to the will of the riders, दिव्यम् wonderful, उत्तमम् excellent, पुष्पकंनाम Pushpaka by name, मम my, भ्रातुः brother, कुबेरस्य Kubera's, विमानम् aerial car, बलीयसा by mighty, रावणेन Ravana, सङ्ग्रामे in combat, हृतम् earned, ते you, भद्रम् be auspicious, इदम् this, त्वदर्थम् for your cause, पालितम् ruled, तिष्ठति retained with me
data.md: The car Pușpaka resembling the Sun, belonging to my brother Kuvera, was brought by the powerful Răvaņa. you of unequalled prowess, that celestial and excellent car, going everywhere at will, since the destruction of Rāvana in battle, is ready for you.

data.v: तदिदं मेघसंकाशं विमानमिह तिष्ठति । तेन यास्यसि यानेन त्वमयोध्यां गजज्वरः ।।
data.es: "This aerial car which waits here which resembles a cloud, will take you to Ayodhya. Be fearless."
data.anv: मेघसङ्काशम् like cloud, तत् that, इदम् this, विमानम् aerial car, इह here, तिष्ठति waits, तेकनेन by this, त्वम् you, अयोध्याम् Ayodhya, विगतज्वरः fearless, यास्यसि will reach
data.md: That car resembling the cloud is in the city of Lanka, in which you shaft, relieved of your anxiety, repair to Ayodhyā.

data.v: अहं ते यद्यनुग्राह्यो यदि स्मरसि मे गुणान् । वस तावदिह प्राज्ञ यद्यस्ति मयि सौहृदम् ।।
data.es: "O Wise Rama! If you permit me, and think kindly of me and remember me, and if you have affection for me stay here for a while."
data.anv: प्राज्ञ wise, ते to you, अहम् I, अनुग्राह्यःयदि if you permit, मे me, गुणान् kindly, स्मरसियदि if you remember, मयि me, सौहृदम् affection, अस्तियदि if you have, इह here, वसतावत् stay for a while
data.md: If I am worthy of being favoured by you, if remember any accomplishment of mineif you have any friendship for me, do you, o wise one, wait here with your brother Lakşmaņa and spouse Vaidehi till I accomplish all my desires by worshipping you. And then you shall go (to Ayodhyā).

data.v: लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा वैदेह्या चापि भार्यया । अर्चितः सर्वकामैस्त्वं ततो राम गमिष्यसि ।।
data.es: "Rama, if all your requirements are met and you are satisfied, then you can start with your brother Lakshmana and wife Vaidehi."
data.anv: राम Rama, भ्रात्रा brother, लक्ष्मणेनसह with Lakshmana, भार्यया wife, वैदेह्यासह with Vaidehi, त्वम् you, सर्वकामैः all requirements, अर्चितः satisfied, ततः then, गमिष्यसि shall start
data.md: If I am worthy of being favoured by you, if remember any accomplishment of mineif you have any friendship for me, do you, o wise one, wait here with your brother Lakşmaņa and spouse Vaidehi till I accomplish all my desires by worshipping you. And then you shall go (to Ayodhyā).

data.v: प्रीतियुक्तस्तु मे राम ससैन्यः ससुहृद्गणः । सत्क्रियां विहितां तावद्गृहाण त्वं मयोद्यताम् ।।
data.es: "Rama, you should accept this hospitality from me at this one occasion, which has been arranged with affection to the army and host of friends."
data.anv: राम Rama, ससैन्यः this army, ससुहृद्गणः host of friends, त्वम् you, मया by me, उद्यताम् prepared, विहिताम् arranged, प्रीतियुक्तस्य with affection, मे by me, सक्रतियाम् at this one occasion, गृहाणतावत् you should accept
data.md: O Rāma, I shall worship you with great delight and do your, O Rama, with your friends and army, accept that adoration. did you

data.v: प्रणयाद्बहुमानाच्च सौहृदेन च राघव । प्रसादयामि प्रेष्योऽहं न खल्वाज्ञापयामि ते ।।
data.es: "I request you out of my high esteem towards you and friendliness. I am your servant and not commanding you to do so."
data.anv: राघव Raghava, प्रणयात् my request, बहुमानाच्छ high esteem, सौहार्देन च out of friendliness, प्रसादयामि I am requesting, अहम् I, प्रेष्यः a servant, ते you, नाज्ञापयामिखलु not to command you
data.md: O Rāma, out of love, honour, and brotherly feeling, I do crave your premising. I am a servant I cannot command you.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्ततो रामः प्रत्युवाच विभीषणम् । रक्षसां वानराणां च सर्वेषां चोपशृण्वताम् ।।
data.es: When Vibheeshana had spoken like that, Kakuthsa Rama replied 'you and monkeys headed by Sugriva bathe and come.'
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्तः spoken, काकुत्थ्सः Kakuthsa, विभीषणम् Vibheeshana, प्रत्युवाच replied, त्वम् you, सुग्रीवमुख्यान् Sugriva and other chiefs, हरीन् monkeys, स्नानेन for bath, उपनिमन्त्रय after bathe and anointing
data.md: Being thus addressed, Rāma replied to Vibhīşaņa in the presence of all the Rākşasas and monkeys, saying.

data.v: पूजितोऽहं त्वया वीर साचिव्येन परंतप । सर्वात्मना च चेष्टिभिः सौहृदेनोत्तमेन च ।।
data.es: "O tormentor of enemies! Hero, I am honoured by your friendship, by your efforts, and good heartedness of all of you."
data.anv: परन्तप tormentor of enemies, वीर hero, साचिव्येन friendship, चेष्टाभिः by your efforts, परेण, सौहार्देन च good heartedness, सर्वात्मना all, त्वया by you, पूजितः honoured, अस्मि I
data.md: I have been worshipped by you, O hero, with your excellent counsels, with your earnest endeavours and with your great friendship.

data.v: न खल्वेतन्न कुर्यां ते वचनं राक्षसेश्वर । तं तु मे भ्रातरं द्रष्टुं भरतं त्वरते मनः ।।
data.es: "Ruler of Rakshasas! Not accepting your request will surely not happen. (but) my mind is hastening to see my brother Bharata."
data.anv: राक्षसेश्वरते the ruler of Rakshasas, एतत् from whom, वचनम् words, न कुर्यामितिन not doing what you tell खलु surely, तु you, भ्रातरम् brother, तम् them, भरतम् Bharat, द्रष्टुम् to see, मनः my mind, त्वरते hastening
data.md: Do not think,O lord of Raksasas, that I do not comply with your request-my heart hastens me to behold my brother Bharata, who, to take me back, did come to the mount Citrakūța, who laid low his crown at my feet and whose words I did not keep.

data.v: मां निवर्तयितुं योऽसौ चित्रकूटमुपागतः । शिरसा याचतो यस्य वचनं न कृतं मया ।।
data.es: "He came to Chitrakuta and on reaching bent down obediently, begged me by his words to return which I did not do. Kausalya, Sumithra and Kaikeyi and Guha also requested and the request of the citizens has been turned down.
data.anv: यःअसौ he who, माम् me, निवर्तयितुम् not turn down, चित्रकूटम् Chitrakuta, उपागतः reached, शिरसा head bent down in obedience, याचतः beg, यस्य his, वचनम् words, मया by me, न कृतम् not done, कौसल्यांच Kausalya's also, सुमित्रां च sumithra, यशस्विनीम् illustrious, कैकेयीं च Kaikeyi too, सुहृदम् good hearted, गुहंच Guha also, जानपदैःसह with people, पौरान् citizens
data.md: Do not think,O lord of Raksasas, that I do not comply with your request-my heart hastens me to behold my brother Bharata, who, to take me back, did come to the mount Citrakūța, who laid low his crown at my feet and whose words I did not keep.

data.v: कौसल्यां च सुमित्रां च कैकेयीं च यशस्विनीम् । गुरूंश्च सुहृदश्चैव पौरांश्च तनयैः सह ।।
data.es: "He came to Chitrakuta and on reaching bent down obediently, begged me by his words to return which I did not do. Kausalya, Sumithra and Kaikeyi and Guha also requested and the request of the citizens has been turned down.
data.anv: यःअसौ he who, माम् me, निवर्तयितुम् not turn down, चित्रकूटम् Chitrakuta, उपागतः reached, शिरसा head bent down in obedience, याचतः beg, यस्य his, वचनम् words, मया by me, न कृतम् not done, कौसल्यांच Kausalya's also, सुमित्रां च sumithra, यशस्विनीम् illustrious, कैकेयीं च Kaikeyi too, सुहृदम् good hearted, गुहंच Guha also, जानपदैःसह with people, पौरान् citizens
data.md: (I am anxious to see) Kausalyā, Sumitrā, Kaikeyi, with my friends, citizens and villagers.

data.v: उपस्थापय मे क्षिप्रं विमानं राक्षसेश्वर । कृतकार्यस्य मे वासः कथंचिदिह संमतः ।।
data.es: "O Ruler of Rakshasas, send for my aerial car. My task has been completed here. How can I continue to stay here?"
data.anv: राक्षसेश्वर ruler of Rakshasas, शीघ्रम् quickly, मे my, विमानम् aerial car, उपस्थापय send for, कृतकार्यस्य completed the task, मे my, इह here, वासः staying, कथम् how, सम्मतः acceptable, स्यात् staying
data.md: Do you speedily bring the car for me, O lord of Räkşasas my work is done-how can I wish to live here long.

data.v: अनुजानीहि मां सौम्य पूजितोऽस्मि विभीषण । मन्युर्न खलु कर्तव्यस्त्वरितस्त्वानुमानये ।।
data.es: Noble Vibheeshana! Please permit me to go. I am honoured by you, my friend. Do not be angry or feel sorry. Let me do my duty."

data.md: Do you regard me, O Vibhīşaņa, O gentle one, as worshipped. O friend do you be not angry-I request you.

data.md: Hearing those words the highly powerful Rāghava, in the presence of Lakşmaņa, gave vent to the following accents out of affection.

data.es: "Let all the forest rangers (without exception) who made effort and fought be duly honoured with valuables and several luxuries."
data.anv: विभीषण Vibheeshana, कृतप्रयत्नकर्माणः who fought making effort, सर्वे all, वनेचराः forest rangers, रत्नैः with valuables, विविधैः several, अर्थैश्च and luxuries, सम्पूज्यन्ताम् duly honoured

data.v: सहैभिरर्दिता लङ्का निर्जिता राक्षसेश्वर । हृष्टैः प्राणभयं त्यक्त्वा संग्रामेष्वनिवर्तिभिः ।।
data.es: "This Lanka could be won with the help of these heroes who never turned back and fought in comb at without fear of life, O Lord of Rakshasas."
data.anv: राक्षसेश्वर Rakshasa Lord, हृष्टैः delighted, प्राणभयम् fear of life, त्यक्त्वा giving up, सङ्ग्रामेषु in the combat, अनिवर्तिभिः who never turned back, अमीभिःसह with these heroes, त्वया by you, लङ्का Lanka, निर्जिता could win
data.md: With these and you, I conquered the city of Lanka, O lord of Raksasas. They all fought with a delighted heart, having renounced all fear of life and who did never go away from the battlefield.

data.v: एवं संमानिताश्चेमे मानार्हा मानद त्वया । भविष्यन्ति कृतज्ञेन निर्वृता हरियूथपाः ।।
data.es: "These helpless monkey troops will be content with gratitude when rewarded, O respectable Vibheeshana."
data.anv: आनदा helpless, मानार्हम् who respects, एवम् that way, कृतज्ञेन in gratitude, त्वया you, सम्मानिताः reward, एते these, हरियूथपाः monkey troops निर्वृता contended, भविष्यन्ति will be
data.md: Being honoured and delighted by you grateful, all these leading monkeys shall repair (to their, respective quarters).

data.v: त्यागिनं संग्रहीतारं सानुक्रोशं यशस्विनम् । यतस्त्वामवगच्छन्ति ततः संबोधयामि ते ।।
data.es: "If you do so you will be called as charitable and kind, not seizing wealth and as one who has gained over senses. That is why I am telling you for so long."
data.anv: त्यागिनम् charitable, सङ्ग्रहीतारम् not seizing, सानुक्रोशम् compassionate, जितेन्द्रियम् gained over senses, त्वाम् you, सर्वे all, अवगच्छन्ति telling you for so long, ततः then, ते you, सम्बोधयामि will call you
data.md: (If you are found to be) sacrificing, self-controlled, compassionate and (the just) collector of revenues, all shall be attached to you. For this I do address you (thus).

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु रामेण वानरांस्तान्विभीषणः । रत्नार्थैः संविभागेन सर्वानेवान्वपूजयत् ।।
data.es: Vibheeshana honoured the Vanaras with gems and valuables, after Rama had spoken like that.
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, एवम् in that way, उक्तः spoken, विभीषणः Vibheeshana, सर्वानेव all, तान् वानरान् those Vanaras, रत्नार्थसम्विभागेन with gems, gold and valuables, अभ्यपूजयत् honoured them very much
data.md: Being thus accosted by Rāma, Vibhīşaņa with a distribution of jewels and riches, honoured all those monkeys.

data.v: ततस्तान्पूजितान्दृष्ट्वा रत्नैरर्थैश्च यूथपान् । आरुरोह ततो रामस्तद्विमानमनुत्तमम् ।।
data.es: Then on seeing the monkey troops being honoured with excellent gemsRama ascended the aerial car.
data.anv: ततः then, रत्नार्थैः with gems, तान् हरियूथपान् those monkey troops, पूजितान् offered prayers, दृष्टवा seeing, रामः Rama, तदा then, अनुत्तमम् excellent, तत् that, विमानम् aerial car, आरुरोह ascended

data.v: अङ्केनादाय वैदेहीं लज्जमानां यशस्विनीम् । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा विक्रान्तेन धनुष्मता ।।
data.es: Illustrious Vaidehi was abashed while she was taken in his(Hanuman’s) arms to Pushpalata while the valiant archers Lakshmana and his brother were there .

data.md: Beholding all those leading monkeys worshipped with jewels and riches Rāma ascended that excellent car, taking the bashful, and high-minded Vaidehi on his lap and accompanied by his powerful brother Laksmana, a skilled bowman.

data.v: अब्रवीच्च विमानस्थः काकुत्स्थः सर्ववानरान् । सुग्रीवं च महावीर्यं राक्षसं च विभीषणम् ।।
data.es: After duly honouring all the Vanaras, to Vibheeshana and highly courageous Sugriva, Kakuthsa spoke as follows.
data.anv: सःकाकुत्स्थ: that Kakuthsa, विमानस्थः in the aerial car, सर्ववानरान् all Vanaras, सविभीषणम् and Vibheeshana, महावीर्यम् highly courageous, सुग्रीवं च Sugriva also, पूजयन् honoured, अब्रवीत् spoke
data.md: Being stationed the Kakutstha honouring all the monkeys, the highly powerful Sugriva and Vibhisana, said.

data.v: मित्रकार्यं कृतमिदं भवद्भिर्वानरोत्तमाः । अनुज्ञाता मया सर्वे यथेष्टं प्रतिगच्छत ।।
data.es: "O Bulls among Vanaras! All of you should go permitted by me. You have done friend's work. You may go where you wish to go. I permit said Rama."
data.anv: वानरर्षभाः bulls among Vanaras, भवद्भि: by me permitted, इदम् this, मित्रकार्यम् friend's work, कृतम् done, सर्वे all, मया by me, अनुज्ञाताः you should go, यथेष्टम् where you wish to, गन्तुम् you may go, अर्हथ I permit.
data.md: O foremost of monkeys, you have performed a friendly service-it has been appreciated by medo you repair to your wished-for quarters.

data.v: यत्तु कार्यं वयस्येन सुहृदा वा परंतप । कृतं सुग्रीव तत्सर्वं भवता धर्मभीरुणा । किष्किन्धां प्रतियाह्याशु स्वसैन्येनाभिसंवृतः ।।
data.es: All that has to be done by an affectionate friend in advanced age has been done, for the fear of unrighteousness. Now you may advance with your army to Kishkinda.
data.anv: सुग्रीव Sugriva, स्निग्धेन affectionate, हितेन च What has to be done, वयस्येन advanced in age, यत् तु all that, कार्यम् work, तत् that, सर्वम् everything, धर्मभीरुणा fear of unrighteousness, भवता by you, कृतम् done, आशु now, स्वसैन्येन with your own army, अभिसम्वृतः surrounding you, किष्किन्धाम् to Kishkinda, याहि can go
data.md: O Sugrīva, you, ever afraid of impiety, have performed all that a loving and well wishing friend should do.

data.v: स्वराज्ये वस लङ्कायां मया दत्ते विभीषण । न त्वां धर्षयितुं शक्ताः सेन्द्रा अपि दिवौकसः ।।
data.es: "Vibheeshana, I would like to see you living like Indra bestowed with your own kingdom in Lanka. It will not be possible for even gods to attack you."
data.anv: विभीषण Vibheeshana, लङ्कायाम् in Lanka, मया by me, दत्ते bestowed, स्वराज्ये own kingdom, वस living, नेन्द्राः Indra, दिवौकसःअपि gods in the heaven even, त्वाम् you, धर्षयितुम् will not be able to attack, न शक्ताः not possible
data.md: on car Do you, encircled by your army, proceed towards Kiskindhā. Do you, O Vibhisana live in your kingdom, Lankā, conferred upon you, by me. Not even the celestials, headed by Indra shall be able to assail you.

data.v: अयोध्यां प्रतियास्यामि राजधानीं पितुर्मम । अभ्यनुज्ञातुमिच्छामि सर्वानामन्त्रयामि वः ।।
data.es: "I shall proceed to my father's capital, Ayodhya. You may permit me. Be auspicious. I take leave of you."
data.anv: ममपितुः my father's, राजधानीम् capital, अयोध्यांप्रति Lord of Ayodhya, यास्यामि to proceed for me, अभ्यनुज्ञातुम् you need to permit, इच्छामि I wish, वः be auspicious, सर्वान् all, अमंत्रयामि I take leave of
data.md: I wish to return to Ayodhyā, the capital of my father's (Kingdom). I wish to obtain your permission (and for this, I have invited you all.

data.v: एवमुक्तास्तु रामेण वानरास्ते महाबलाः । ऊचुः प्राञ्जलयो रामं राक्षसश्च विभीषणः । अयोध्यां गन्तुमिच्छामः सर्वान्नयतु नो भवान् ।।
data.es: After Rama had spoken that way Sugriva, Vibheeshana, monkeys and Rakshasas saluted Rama and said as follows.
